IS590DV - Data Viz

This is the course website for IS590DV in Spring 2020

  • View On GitHub

Week 1 - Introduction

This week, we went over the structure of the course, as well as some basics of why we visualize, who we visualize for, and how to think about our relationship with our data.

  • Mark Newman’s Election Maps
  • Lilo & Stitch
  • Peg + Cat: The Three Friends Problem
  • FRED
  • Example Vega-Lite plot

Downloads

  • FRED GDP.csv file
  • Reworked Stitch Image

Optional Reading List (See syllabus for acronyms)

  1. VAD, Ch. 1: What’s Viz, and Why Do It?
  2. FDA, Ch. 1: Introduction & FDA, Ch. 17: The principle of proportional ink
  3. Same Data, Multiple Perspectives
